ygData.subject: Re: on switching servers for a guild
ygData.msgSnippet: OOPS! Sorry, I was just guessing.   Its just that the Lich Clan has had a web page longer than I have seen them running around so I assumed ( I know, I know )
ygData.messageBody:
OOPS!

Sorry, I was just guessing. Its just that the Lich Clan has had a web page
longer than I have seen them running around so I assumed ( I know, I know )
that they were an older organization. Ah well, originating on Zek just
means you're that much cooler!

~Xillith.


>From: "Jeremy" <Jeremy@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] on switching servers for a guild
>Date: Fri, 18 Jun 1999 13:35:03 -0500
>
>From: "Jeremy" <Jeremy@...>
>
>I'm an officer of Clan of the Lich. We're only on Zek.
>
>-Bazkak, Troll SK
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 11:03 AM
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] on switching servers for a guild
>
>
> > From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
> >
> > Well,
> > I am aware of several guilds that have existed in other game
>settings,
> > the Covetous Crew being one of them. I BELIEVE ( but I am not entirely
>sure
> > ) that "The Clan of the Lich" existed on another server before appearing
>on
> > Zek.
> >
> > Go to
> > www.ralloszek.com
> > and look up the guilds there. "Lich" is one of them and I recall from
> > reading their charter that they were or still are on another server.
> >
> > Enjoy Rallos Zek, it's a blast.
> >
> > ~Xillith
> >
> >
> > >From: kith@...
> > >Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> > >To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> > >Subject: [eq_shadowknights] on switching servers for a guild

> > >
> > >From: kith@...
> > >
> > >Greetings Shadowknights,
> > >
> > >I'm fairly sure that once a guild is approved, it can be set on any or
> > >all servers, but I was wondering how. Must you re-create the same
> > >character, and then talk to a GM? Or is is more complicated? Recently,
>I
> > >started a guild on Tunare with another character, and now I'd like to
> > >have it on Rallos Zek, because it is probably the greatest server for
> > >roleplaying, hands down. Any advice is appreciated!
> > >Thanks,
> > >
> > >Envy (tunare)
> > >Shadow Striders
> > >
> > >(aka- Sugan on Tunare and 'Zek)
